subject: PS - Pets & The Ghost Box
author: eastern_paranormal
full_text:
I've gotten a lot of information about my deceased pets and friends pets via GB. I uploaded a couple of them tonight and a picture of our beloved dogs Piggie Sue (The one in the bumble bee costume) and Bear with me on their last Christmas. They died just 10 days apart. Bear died just a month before his 19 birthday with us. 

Gabreael
